name: Gold Excellence Medal
description: Awarded for outstanding performance and exceptional dedication to excellence. This prestigious medal recognizes individuals who have demonstrated superior skills and unwavering commitment to their craft.
affects: Increases prestige by 50 points, boosts confidence level, grants access to elite events and networking opportunities

name: Silver Achievement Award
description: Recognizes significant accomplishments and notable contributions to the field. Recipients have shown consistent high performance and leadership qualities.
affects: Increases prestige by 30 points, enhances reputation, provides mentorship opportunities

name: Bronze Merit Badge
description: Celebrates dedication and hard work in pursuing goals. This medal acknowledges those who have shown perseverance and steady progress in their endeavors.
affects: Increases prestige by 15 points, boosts motivation, unlocks training programs

name: Diamond Leadership Medal
description: The highest honor bestowed upon exceptional leaders who have transformed their organizations and inspired countless others. This rare medal is reserved for visionary individuals who have made lasting impact.
affects: Increases prestige by 100 points, grants executive privileges, provides access to board positions and strategic committees

name: Innovation Pioneer Award
description: Celebrates groundbreaking ideas and revolutionary thinking. Recipients have introduced novel concepts that have significantly advanced their field and created new possibilities.
affects: Increases creativity by 40 points, unlocks research funding, provides patent support and innovation labs access

name: Team Collaboration Medal
description: Honors exceptional teamwork and collaborative spirit. This medal recognizes individuals who excel at bringing people together and achieving collective success.
affects: Increases team synergy by 35 points, improves communication skills, grants access to leadership workshops

name: Service Excellence Badge
description: Awarded for outstanding customer service and dedication to helping others. Recipients have consistently gone above and beyond to ensure satisfaction and positive experiences.
affects: Increases service rating by 45 points, enhances customer loyalty, provides service training certifications

name: Academic Achievement Medal
description: Recognizes exceptional scholarly performance and intellectual contributions. This medal celebrates those who have excelled in research, teaching, or academic leadership.
affects: Increases knowledge points by 60 points, unlocks advanced courses, provides research grants and sabbatical opportunities

name: Safety Guardian Award
description: Honors commitment to workplace safety and protection of others. Recipients have demonstrated vigilance, implemented safety measures, and prevented accidents through their dedication.
affects: Increases safety rating by 55 points, reduces incident risk, grants safety inspector credentials

name: Environmental Steward Medal
description: Celebrates dedication to environmental protection and sustainable practices. This medal recognizes individuals who have made significant contributions to conservation and green initiatives.
affects: Increases environmental impact by 40 points, unlocks green technology access, provides sustainability consulting opportunities

name: Mentorship Excellence Award
description: Recognizes outstanding dedication to guiding and developing others. Recipients have shown exceptional ability to nurture talent and help others reach their full potential.
affects: Increases mentoring effectiveness by 50 points, expands professional network, grants access to mentorship programs

name: Digital Innovation Badge
description: Celebrates mastery of digital technologies and digital transformation leadership. This modern medal acknowledges those who have successfully navigated and led digital change.
affects: Increases tech proficiency by 45 points, unlocks digital tools, provides access to innovation hubs and tech conferences
